text: Gaël Faye (Milk Coffee and Sugar) September 2014 Gaël Faye (born 6 August 1982) is a Rwandan-French singer, rapper, and writer. He was born in Bujumbura, Burundi of a French father and Rwandan mother. He emigrated in France at the age of 13 escaping from the Burundian civil war. j'aime les patates He wrote a book about it, Small Country (Petit Pays), a semi- biographical book. It was first published in France in August 2016 by Grasset, and has since been translated into 36 languages. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Rwandan writers Category:Rwandan singers Category:Living people
title: Gaël Faye
